channel.title: Redmine on Damien Saunders
channel.description: Recent content in Redmine on Damien Saunders

item.title: Redmine for Issues & Bug track – things I learned
item.description: Redmine is described as a flexible project management web application SaaS. I’ve been using it for the past 5 months within a mobile marketing agency – where its used for testing, operations, work orders, issue management and its wiki is used for documentation. Redmine can not be compared to other bug track, issues or fault management systems like JIRA or CRM platforms with helpdesk tools. It’s flexible, but that comes with a price.
